enhanced_by.reason: The text() method provides the combined text of all matched elements, which can be used to set up the state for hasText() to check.
The eachText() method retrieves the text content of each matched element, which can be used to set up the state for hasText() to check.
The text() method returns the combined text of all matched elements, which can be used to construct assertions for hasText() to verify non-blank text content.
The eachText() method returns a list of each matched element's text content, which can be used to construct assertions for hasText() to verify non-blank text content.
